Summary: While traveling west on rt 34 in Derby Ct 6-1-2013 appox 22:20 pm I saw two headlight objects hovering in the air
trends: There has been one other sighting in Derby
There were no other sightings in Derby on or around June 1st 2013
divs: sighting detailswhile traveling west on rt 34 in derby ct 6-1-2013 appox 22:20 pm i saw two headlight objects hovering in the air. i was comming home for the evening driving my car. i first noticed this object because of how bright it was and the fact that it was just hovering in the same spot in the sky. i certainly did not know what it was which was why i just kept looking. the object looked like two basketballs in the sky brightly lit with a cloud of light around it, it was hovering. i had no immediate feeling just wondering what the heck it is\was. i lost sight of the object after pulling into driveway when i got out of the car and looked for it it was gone.
